reviews.content: Wouldn’t it recommend this for now, crashes a lot

What a pity!
I loved this tweak. It has been with me until 13.5.
Now, on iOS 14.3 I will have to install (Hopefully temporarily) Five Icon Dock until it’s fixed.
Good luck to developers and much power!
Too many bug, dock, vertical split screen, recents compatibility issue with Zenith, not showing apps. Also slows down device
Can’t open the FloatyDock settings in Settings

Great tweak so far only annoyance is my apps expanding on the screen like they are zoomed in

-PortTaco
